text: Khan Noonien Singh, better known as Khan, is a fictional supervillain in the Star Trek science fiction franchise. The character first appeared in the 1967 Star Trek: The Original Series episode "Space Seed"."It is better to rule in hell than serve in heaven" Paradise Lost (Book I), John Milton, 1667.Space Seed" (script) He also appeared in the 1982 movie Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan. In both of those, he was portrayed by Ricardo Montalb√°n. In the 2013 movie Star Trek Into Darkness, he was played by Benedict Cumberbatch. ==References== Category:Star Trek characters Category:Fictional dictators Category:Fictional mass murderers Category:Supervillains
title: Khan Noonien Singh
